plot: A police detective, burdened by the stress of her job, encounters a career prostitute fresh from a beating and at the end of her rope.
title: Lilith's Daughters
plot_es: A police detective, burdened by the stress of her job, encounters a career prostitute fresh from a beating and at the end of her rope.
plot_en: A police detective, burdened by the stress of her job, encounters a career prostitute fresh from a beating and at the end of her rope.
